name: Read / Write / Access
description:
Combine fast-paced movement and preemptive strategy to steal valuable corporate data files in the shortest amount of time. You are too slow, hacker.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

LMB - Icebreaker gun to freeze sentries

Space - Jump

R - Restart

Escape - Exit Game

A game by Dillon Rogers.

Music by Joe Baxter-Webb.

Like my games? Follow me at @Jollyrogers99 or contact me here.
